episodes.title: Cult-to-MLM Pipeline - Why Do Ex-CULT Members Join Multilevel Marketing? | #cults  | #igotout | #mlm
episodes.description:
R E S O U R C E S  &  L I N K S

Original post on Substack: https://michellecarpenter.substack.com/p/out-of-the-frying-pan/

Cult recovery resources: 
https://igotout.org/
https://holdingouthelp.org/
More info about MLM: 
https://outofmlm.info/
https://www.foolproofme.org/
https://www.ponzinomics.com/

*NEW* Look up a brand or company to see if they are an MLM: https://antimlm.org

Dr. Stephen Hassan's BITE Model: https://freedomofmind.com/cult-mind-control/bite-model/
Jon M. Taylor/Consumer Awareness Institute - The Case For (and Against) Multilevel Marketing (99% loss rate statistic): https://www.ftc.gov/sites/default/files/documents/public_comments/trade-regulation-rule-disclosure-requirements-and-prohibitions-concerning-business-opportunities-ftc.r511993-00017%C2%A0/00017-57317.pdf
The Witness Wore Red, Rebecca Musser: https://amzn.to/3GdWrle/ (affiliate link)
Growing Up in Polygamy YouTube channel: @GrowingUpinPolygamy 
How People Leave One Cult--And Join Another, Rolling Stone: https://www.rollingstone.com/culture/culture-features/what-is-cult-hopping-nxivm-dos-838750/ 
MLM has a worse loss rate than gambling (stat): https://www.ftc.gov/sites/default/files/documents/public_comments/trade-regulation-rule-disclosure-requirements-and-prohibitions-concerning-business-opportunities-ftc.r511993-00004%C2%A0/00004-57286.pdf

Other YouTube channels worth checking out if you have left a high-control group, are thinking of leaving one, or are simply interested in deconstruction:
@AmandaLovesRachel 
@markvicente7 
@FreedomofMindResourceCenter 
@JulieAndersonvideos 
@EskelsCultExpirience 
@GeneticallyModifiedSkeptic 

Find me on:
Instagram @falliblespoonie & @outofmlm
TikTok @spoonstop
Twitter @realmichcarp & @outofmlm

Chapters:
00:00 Intro
04:39 Resource Websites
07:54 On Writing
08:49 Article/Blog Post: Out of the Frying Pan...
10:06 Cults
13:39 MLM
16:34 Multilevel Marketing's Appeal to LDS Women
20:36 Cult-Hopping/Cult-Jumping
23:30 Coercive Control in MLM
25:52 Final Thoughts (for now)
27:57 Feedback

episodes.title: BITE Out Of MLM: Cognitive Dissonance part 2 - Chat w/ Jenni Wild | ANTIMLM
episodes.description:
For part 2 of our dive into Cognitive Dissonance, I chat with fellow anti-MLM content creator and activist, Jenni Wild. We recall examples of cognitive dissonance from our own time in MLM, and as a "BONUS" (ie. random tangent) I decided to ask Jenni the questions I was asked last weekend on the Content Creators Panel at the 2nd Annual Multilevel Marketing Conference! More about the conference can be found at https://www.MLMconference.com/

***

BITE Out Of MLM is a series that dives into some of the psychology terms, cult and manipulation tactics, and hot-button issues frequently heard in the anti-cult, anti-scam, anti-MLM world, and attempts to define them individually in formats that are accessible and digestible for the typical viewer of this kind of content. Topics may include terms used to describe the feelings one experiences when acting under undue influence and when leaving high-demand groups, as well as terms used to describe the manipulation tactics used by such groups.

For more resources please check out the following websites:
https://www.freedomofmind.com/
https://www.MLMchange.org/
https://www.igotout.org/ 
https://www.foolproofme.org/ 
https://www.ponzinomics.com/ 

The goal is accessibility, so I welcome any and all feedback and suggestions. Please email me at mich@spoonstop.com or leave a comment on this video!

My Etsy store: https://www.etsy.com/shop/SpoonStop/
My website: https://www.spoonstop.com

My #antimlm socials:
IG: https://www.instagram.com/falliblespoonie/ 
TT: https://www.tiktok.com/@spoonstop/  

My guest Jenni Wild's socials:
IG: https://www.instagram.com/thejenniwild/ 
TT: https://www.tiktok.com/@thejenniwild/  

EPISODE LINKS:

Scarred: The True Story of How I Escaped NXIVM, the Cult That Bound My Life by Sarah Edmondson - https://amzn.to/3y8W879/

The Sociopath Next Door by Martha Stout - https://amzn.to/3HKklUr

@IsabellaLanter 's 12 Month YouTube Planner - https://www.lulu.com/en/us/shop/isabella-lanter/the-ultimate-12-month-youtube-planner/hardcover/product-y44qkj.html?page=1&pageSize=4
 
Please also check out some of my favorite anti-MLM YouTubers below:
@Tallglassofmallory 
@theantibot 
@RecoveringHunbot 
@amaljwilliams 
@evamateja 
@TheJessicaHickson 
@RobertaBlevinsLAMLM 
@HannahAlonzo 


All opinions in this video are my own. Some product links may be Amazon Affiliate links.

SOURCES AND ADDITIONAL LINKS
MLMconf Multilevel Marketing: The Consumer Protection Challenge 2022 - https://www.mlmconference.com/
NXIVM & Hassan BITE Model and Undue Influence - https://freedomofmind.com/nxivm-hassan-bite-model-and-undue-influence/#Cognitive-Dissonance 
What Causes Cognitive Dissonance? By John P. Cunha - https://www.emedicinehealth.com/what_causes_cognitive_dissonance/article_em.htm
The Case (for and) Against Multi-Level Marketing, by Jon M. Taylor - https://www.ftc.gov/sites/default/files/documents/public_comments/trade-regulation-rule-disclosure-requirements-and-prohibitions-concerning-business-opportunities-ftc.r511993-00017%C2%A0/00017-57317.pdf/

episodes.title: Multilevel Marketing: The Consumer Protection Challenge 2022
Are Business Expenses REALLY Expenses If You USE The Product? Don't Ask This Beachbody Hun!
YOUNG LIVING SENDS TOP REPS BOOK ON... WITCHCRAFT?! CHECK OUT THE VIDEO WITH ME AND CHRIS PENCZAK!
episodes.description:
Welcome to my little baby YouTube channel! I'm so glad you found me. I'm a wife, a mommy, a full time techy, part time small business owner & anti-MLM commentator, and a cord-carrying (yes, I spelled that right) student/practitioner of Witchcraft and Pagan/New Age spirituality for 15+ years. In this video, I'll be learning about the methods taught by Robert Tennyson Stevens in his book My Words Made Flesh, a guide and manual sent out by the Mormon essential oils MLM Young Living to their top leaders--and then comparing his teachings to those taught by Christopher Penczak in HIS book The Inner Temple of Witchcraft: Magick, Meditation, and Psychic Development. Spoiler alert: they are the same.

Sources: 
The Inner Temple of Witchcraft by Christopher Penczak - https://amzn.to/3gIxL6W (affiliate link)
Using Essential Oils in a New Way Webinar - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qbx_Nh2ZLZE

Come find me on other platforms:
My website: https://www.spoonstop.com
